formElement.label: FitNesseRoot path:
formElement.documentation: The directory in which FitNesse expects to find its page root. It defaults to the fitnesse.jar directory plus '/FitNesseRoot'.

formElement.label: FitNesse Port:
formElement.documentation: The port number that FitNesse new instance listens to. The default is 80 because this is the port that internet browsers use by default. If your machine already has a web server running, it will be using port 80, so FitNesse should be set up to use a different port, like 8080.

formElement.label: Java extra args:
formElement.documentation: Additional command line arguments to create a new Fitnesse instance. (For example, -o, -l <path> {no logging}, -Xmx...).

formElement.label: Path to java:
formElement.documentation: Path where java bin is located.

formElement.label: Results filename:
formElement.documentation: Provide the path and file name for the resulting xml file.

formElement.label: Target page:
formElement.documentation: The name of the FitNesse wiki page being referenced to execute as the test target. (For example, FitNesse.SuiteAcceptanceTests or FitNesse.SuiteAcceptanceTests.SuiteSlimTests.ChainTest)

formElement.label: Target Type:
formElement.documentation: Select the type for the target.

formElement.label: JobStep Timeout:
formElement.documentation: Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.
